How to citeÔÉÅ

When using QuantNBody for research projects, please cite our reference paper :

Yalouz et al., (2022). QuantNBody: a Python package for quantum chemistry and physics to build and manipulate many-body operators and wave functions. Journal of Open Source Software, 7(80), 4759
